SELECT A.BOARD_IDX , A.BOARD_KEY , A.PARENT_IDX , CONCAT(A.TITLE, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN CONCAT(' (', COUNT(*), ')') ELSE '' END FROM TB_COMMENT B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.BOARD_KEY = A.BOARD_KEY )) AS TITLE , A.NAME , A.CONTENTS , A.HIT_CNT , A.CHK_INFO , A.DEL_YN , A.PC_DT FROM ( SELECT T1.BOARD_IDX , T1.BOARD_KEY , T1.PARENT_IDX , T1.TITLE , (CASE WHEN T1.USER_KEY <> '' THEN ( SELECT T2.USER_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USER_KEY = T2.USER_KEY ) ELSE T1.NAME END) AS NAME , T1.CONTENTS , T1.HIT_CNT , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.DEL_YN , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_DVSN = #{BOARD_DVSN} AND T1.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{BOARD_LIKE}, '%')
UNION
SELECT T1.BOARD_IDX , T1.BOARD_KEY , T1.PARENT_IDX , T1.TITLE , (CASE WHEN T1.USER_KEY <> '' THEN ( SELECT T2.USER_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USER_KEY = T2.USER_KEY ) ELSE T1.NAME END) AS NAME , T1.CONTENTS , T1.HIT_CNT , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.DEL_YN , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_DVSN = #{BOARD_DVSN} AND T1.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{BOARD_LIKE}, '%') ) A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.BOARD_IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_IDX , BOARD_KEY , PARENT_IDX , USER_KEY , TITLE , NAME , BOARD_PWD , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , CHK_INFO , BOARD_DVSN , LUPD_CNT , DEL_YN , PC_DT , PC_TS ) VALUES ( NULL , #{BOARD_KEY} , IFNULL(#{PARENT_IDX}, 0) , #{USER_KEY} , #{TITLE} , #{NAME} , #{BOARD_PWD} , #{CONTENTS} , 1 , IFNULL(#{CHK_INFO}, '0') , #{COMMAND} , 1 , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = IFNULL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY}
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN T1.USER_KEY <> '' THEN ( SELECT T2.USER_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USER_KEY = T2.USER_KEY ) ELSE T1.NAME END) AS NAME , T1.BOARD_KEY , T1.USER_KEY , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.TITLE , T1.CONTENTS , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET LUPD_CNT = IFNULL(LUPD_CNT, 0) + 1 , DEL_YN = 'Y' , PC_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT T1.BOARD_PWD FROM TB_BOARD T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY}

SELECT T1.COMMENT_IDX , T1.BOARD_KEY , T1.SQNO , T1.COMMENT_NAME , T1.COMMENT_CONTENTS , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_COMMENT T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY} ORDER BY T1.SQNO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT ( COMMENT_IDX , BOARD_KEY , SQNO , COMMENT_NAME , COMMENT_CONTENTS , LUPD_CNT , DEL_YN , PC_DT , PC_TS ) VALUES ( NULL , #{BOARD_KEY} , ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SQNO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_COMMENT T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY} ) , #{COMMENT_NAME} , #{COMMENT_CONTENTS} , 1 , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
